nodes.text: Smeer Ze-Trios was a male Neimoidian who worked for the Trade Federation. During the Invasion of Naboo in 32 BBY, Ze-Trios worked as a Settlement Warden for the Federation, overseeing prison camps on Naboo. He was considered to be brutal.
Smeer Ze-Trios was voiced by Roger Jackson in the 2000 video game Star Wars: Episode I: Battle for Naboo.
